title: How can I pass on info about someone who added me after game and threatened me
body: Just wondering how to pass on information about a player who decided to add me then threaten me after game saying "he would come find me and stab me" and a bunch of stupid stuff. I'm not worried about his petty threats but I would really like this player to be banned for what he is doing I wouldn't wish a younger player in this community to go through something so ridiculous. I have the chat box open I can screen shot the chat logs ect just need some help from a RIOT employee

replies.body: Screenshot the messages and submit them in a ticket to Riot Support. This is a direct link to the Support Ticket section: https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new
Support ticket is the option mate.
